See ApproverUtils script include for implementation details.</description><local_or_existing/><name>incident</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = new ApproverUtils().canApproversRead();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-09-14 16:29:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>2ae9f9625f011000b12e3572f2b477de</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">512c4353d1e302104f34ba60d8b7c1fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_2ae9f9625f011000b12e3572f2b477de</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-23 09:10:41</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_80a7a096c0a8016662c872762163bbdc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow create for records in incident, for users with role snc_internal, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing/><name>incident</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;
if(pm.isActive('com.snc.incident.mim') && current.major_incident_state == 'accepted'){
	if(gs.hasRole('major_incident_manager'))
		answer = true;
	else
		answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>myla.jordan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-04-23 04:39:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>80a7a096c0a8016662c872762163bbdc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">512c4353d1e302104f34ba60d8b7c1fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_80a7a096c0a8016662c872762163bbdc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-23 09:10:40</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_7da3bda1c0a801667dc88c1e9527f776
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>You can read an incident if you opened it, are the caller of record, or are on the watch list</description><local_or_existing/><name>incident</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[current.opened_by == gs.getUserID() || current.caller_id == gs.getUserID() || current.watch_list.indexOf(gs.getUserID()) > -1;]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>myla.jordan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2011-04-22 14:36:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>7da3bda1c0a801667dc88c1e9527f776</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">512c4353d1e302104f34ba60d8b7c1fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_7da3bda1c0a801667dc88c1e9527f776</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-23 09:10:40</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
